    J

    JEN

    MultiVendor Commerce

    Features Vendors Preview Contact

    The everyday marketplace for food  & FMCG

    JEN brings restaurants, groceries, and fastmoving consumer goods into one simple app. Discover nearby vendors, order in minutes, and track delivery in realtime.

      Under 30minute delivery windows in supported zones Multivendor cart: mix restaurants and grocery items Secure payments and transparent fees
    Palette
    #acb625

    Built for speed, built for scale

    A modern multivendor stack that delights customers and empowers vendors.

    } /> } /> } /> } /> } /> } />

    Restaurants

    Quickserve, casual dining, cloud kitchens. Support for combos, addons, and prep times.

    FMCG & Groceries

    Everything from milk and bread to personal care and cleaning suppliesdelivered fast.

    Mobile screens preview

    Use this as a reference for spacing, typography, and component hierarchy.

    JEN e-commerce platform ~ Coming Soon!

    Starting with this mockup as a design spec. We shall expand into flows for vendor onboarding, web client and mobile apps gradually.

    {new Date().getFullYear()} JEN ~ MM-ICT
